    • paintListOfCards

      public List<String> paintListOfCards(List<String> stringList, List<Card> cardList) throws IllegalCommandException
      Paints the list of the strings representing the cards
      Parameters:
      stringList - the list of strings that contain the cards to be painted
      cardList - the list of cards to be painted
      Returns:
      the updated colored list of strings
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException

    • paintStructure

      public String paintStructure(char[][] board, Map<Integer,Triplet<Card,Boolean,Boolean>> coordinateToCard) throws IllegalCommandException
      Paints the structure
      Parameters:
      board - the strcuture to be painted as a matrix of characters
      coordinateToCard - the map that contains the coordinates of the cards and how they are placed
      Returns:
      the string representing the colored/painted board
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException
